name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dash - transient todo and notes app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alt+X / Option+X to start.
Simple todo and notes app that forgets tasks that you complete.
Quick, themeable, works offline (uses Chrome sync storage).
Use Dash for making tasks within browser, that need to be done quick, and which you don't need to remember after completing.
Choose themes to suit your mood and style.

Update 2.3.1: Updated Keyboard shortcut to X + D
Update 2.2: More themes, better tasks ui.
Update 2.0: With folders for notes! And ui improvements.
Update 1.4: Removed bad themes, save notes is more reliable.
Update 1.3: Press Alt/Cmd + Z to open & close the popup!
Update 1.2: Now supports notes!
